item.description:
We've reserved a playing field at Jamaica Pond. Why? To test our kickball mettle against that of the Boston-area Humanists and the Boston Skeptics. To the victors will go bragging rights; all are invited to the picnic.

Teams will be assembled on the day-of, from among those in attendance. Come prepared to kick well and hard, o ye godless athletes.

We've got the park from noon - 5 PM. Parking is available on Perkins Street; those without cars can take the T to Jackson Square. Google map: http://maps.google.co...

Note: this is not in Olmstead Park. It is the only playing field in the grounds adjoining Jamaica Pond.

The picnic is a potluck -- all kinds of park-friendly food and bev will be welcome. Please, if you have them, bring folding tables for the food and folding chairs for bottoms.

Many thanks to BA member Jennifer Markowitz for making the logistical arrangements.
item.name: Secular Kickball Tournament of Death (and picnic)
